util

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Weapon

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract Class to define an Item.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haeldeus

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean bop
      The boolean value, if the Item is bound on pickup.
      private java.lang.String icon
      The icon, that this Item uses.
      private int id
      The unique ID of this Item.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the Item.
      private boolean setItem
      The boolean value, if this Item is part of a set.
      private java.util.HashMap<Stat,java.lang.Integer> stats
      The Stats, this Item provides when used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            int id,
            java.lang.String icon,
            boolean bop,
            boolean setItem,
            java.util.HashMap<Stat,java.lang.Integer> stats)
        Creates a new Item with the given attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - The Name of the Item.
        id - The ID of the Item.
        icon - The Icon, this Item is using as a String-Declarer.
        bop - Determines, if this Item is bound on Pickup.
        setItem - Determines, if this Item is part of a Set.
        stats - The Stats, this Item provides as a HashMap.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        HashMap

        Returns the name of the Item.

        The name of the Item as a String.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns The ID of the Item.
        Returns:
        The ID of the Item as an Integer.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getIcon

        public java.lang.String getIcon()
        Returns the Icon of the Item.
        Returns:
        The Icon of the Item as a String, that can be used to find this Icon inside the \resources\-Folder.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isBop

        public boolean isBop()
        Returns, if the Item is bound on pickup.
        Returns:
        true, if this Item is bound when picked up, false else.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isSetItem

        public boolean isSetItem()
        Returns, if the Item is part of a Set.
        Returns:
        true, if this Item is part of a Set, false else.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getStats

        public java.util.HashMap<Stat,java.lang.Integer> getStats()
        Returns the Stats, this Item provides when used.
        Returns:
        The Stats, this Item provides as a HashMap of Stats and Integer.
        Since:
        1.0
